title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 112.5 - Seed standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 112.5 - Seed standards

State Regulations
(a) General provisions. (1)

Unless
otherwise specified, storage is to be in air-tight moisture proof containers at
a moisture content of less than eight per cent and at a temperature below 40
degrees Fahrenheit from time of sampling until shipment. (2)

Tree seeds meeting the regular laboratory
test standards required for certification will be tagged with the regular blue
tag. Seed failing to meet these standards, but complying with stated lower
requirements in germination and purity will be marked with a green
certification tag. (b) Specific provisions. Certified Blue

Tag
